title: New method shows great potential for the treatment of Alzheimer's disease
text: In Alzheimer's disease, a protein (peptide) forms clumps in the brain and causes sufferers to lose their memory. A research group has now described a new treatment method that increases the body's own degradation of the building blocks that lead to these protein clumps.
author: Latest Science News -- ScienceDaily

title: Ants swallow their own acid to protect themselves from germs
text: Ants use their own acid to disinfect themselves and their stomachs. A team has found that formic acid kills harmful bacteria in the animal's food, thereby reducing the risk of disease. At the same time, the acid significantly influences the ant's intestinal flora.
author: Latest Science News -- ScienceDaily

title: Spotify will let artists give their songs a boost \u2014 and get paid less in exchange
text:
Spotify

  
Spotify’s going to test letting artists and labels influence more of what its algorithm promotes. The company announced today a new test for all artists and labels on the platform where they can decide to promote any music that’s important to them. So, for example, if Fleetwood Mac wanted to promote “Dreams” after it went viral on TikTok, they could decide to do so, and Spotify’s algorithm would consider that request when building a radio session or when a listener enters autoplay. Of course, this could apply to any song, including tracks that might be new or that artists want to put extra promotional push behind.
“We want to be able to provide tools that help our artists leverage those moments, so they can be more in control of their...
Continue reading…
author: The Verge -  All Posts
